new materials.sentence: DSPE-PEG2000 -DBCO (1,2-distearoyl-sn-glycero-3-phosphoethanolamine-N-[dibenzocyclooctyl(polyethylene glycol)-2000] (ammonium salt)) was purchased from Avanti Polar Lipids, Inc.

models.sentence: We developed a novel magnetic nanoprobe (MNP) surface functionalized with Zn2+-dipicolylamine (ZnDPA), which could selectively target phosphatidylserine (PS) on apoptotic cells and then amplify apoptosis-targeted T2-weighted magnetic resonance (MR) imaging in vivo.
